events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn’t fit properly and I no longer need it.
The customer's request has been categorized under refund based on the description involving a return and money back request.
A support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello, thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I’m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging for a smooth refund?
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is unused and I have kept it in its original packaging as requested.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and you should receive the amount back within 5-7 business days.
That’s great news, thanks for handling this quickly. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund has been processed and the funds will appear in your account shortly. Please contact us if you have any further concerns.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case.
